content: User quota has been successfully enabled.

comment.text: The "UserQuotaEnabled" translation key is used to display a success message when user quota has been successfully enabled. It is typically displayed as a toast notification in an application, providing confirmation to users that their quotas have been set up correctly after enabling it.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ກວ່ານິຍົມຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້ໄດ້ຖືກເປີດໃຊ້ງານຢ່າງສໍາເລັດແລ້ວ' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Lao. 'ກວ່ານິຍົມ' (Kuan Niyom) translates to 'quota' or 'limit', but using it this way is stilted.  A more natural phrasing would focus on the action of enabling.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like 'ການກຳນົດກໍານົນຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້ສາມາດເຮັດໄດ້ແລ້ວ' (Kan kamnod goranon khong phou sai samat het dai laeo) - which translates to 'User limits/restrictions are now enabled'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation 'Limit użytkowników został włączony' translates to 'User limit has been enabled'. While related, it doesn't precisely match the English 'User quota has been successfully enabled.' 'Quota' implies a defined amount or allowance, which isn't conveyed by 'limit'.
While the translation is understandable, "Cotă de stocare pentru utilizator" is a bit verbose. A more natural and concise translation for 'User quota' would be 'Cota de utilizator'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota de utilizator a fost activată cu succes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'enabled' doesn't directly translate to 'подключена' (connected) in Russian when referring to a quota setting. 'Включена' (included/enabled) would be a more accurate translation.

The translation 'පරිශීලක කෝටාව සාර්ථකව ක්‍රියාත්මක කර ඇත' translates more literally as 'User quota has been successfully activated'. While not entirely wrong, 'enabled' is a more accurate translation of 'enabled' in this context. 'ක්‍රියාත්මක කර ඇත' implies more of an active process than 'enabled'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලක කෝටාව සාර්ථකව සක්‍රීය කර ඇත.
